A.P. government is determined to make Vijayawada a flood-free zone, says WRD Minister
disaster_articles.description: The negligence of the previous YSRCP government had led to the disastrous floods in Vijayawada, says Nimmala Ramanaidu

disaster_articles.title: At AIIMS Delhi, patients stare at 3-year waitlist for MRI scan
disaster_articles.description: Patients at AIIMS Delhi face prolonged waiting periods, up to three years, for MRI scans due to high demand and limited resources. While the hospital prioritizes emergency and inpatient cases, non-urgent outpatients often experience significant delays.  Efforts are underway to implement a digital appointment system with defined cut-off periods to address the issue.

disaster_articles.title: After US Missile, Ukraine Fires UK's 'Storm Shadow' Into Russia: Report
disaster_articles.description: Storm Shadow debris was found in Russia's Kursk region to the north of Ukraine.

disaster_articles.title: New York's First Drought Warning In 22 Years As City Faces Water Crisis
disaster_articles.description: New York City has declared its first drought warning in 22 years, responding to a severe lack of rainfall and a series of brush fires that plagued the Northeast this autumn.
